name: Oddly Specific
description:
Like surprise horror games? Then Oddly Specific is perfect for you!

Follow a story of a boy who is crazy in love (and slightly obsessed) with a girl who is crazy in love with herself.

Make different choices that affect your ending, and make one choice at the start that affects what side of the story you'll get to see! 

Note that you have to re-play the game multiple times to understand some of the endings.

It has 6 endings,  3 for one character and 3 for the other!

The game contains some disturbing imagery and gore, blood, etc.  Stay safe! 

Its also just like so cool and took me a year to make and idk if I already said this but its SO COOL so go play this
